import React,{Component} from 'react' import './SignIn.css' window.process = {} // convert form const SignIn = ({onRouteChange}) => { to class to have state class SignIn extends Component { render() { const {onRouteChange} = this.props return (
Sign In
onRouteChange('home')} className="b ph3 pv2 input-reset ba b--black bg-transparent grow pointer f6 dib" type="submit" value="Sign in" />

onRouteChange('register')} className="f6 link dim black db pointer">Register

) }; } export default SignIn;
